title: It won't let me log in
body:
https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/362845679233662976/382046004297334794/unknown.png


Keeps saying this 

I also recently rolled back a windows update that broke a lot of things on my computer.

replies.body: Hmmmm you might have had some of your network settings accidentally reset as well when you did that rollback. Double check your port forwarding and DNS settings first I would say using those steps outlined in the [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues), but if that doesn't help do me a favor and try using an ethernet cord really quick and test that.
